name: CNN
text: "Race and racism is a reality that so many of us grow up learning to just deal with. But if we ever hope to move past it, it can't just be on people of color to deal with it," former first lady Michelle Obama said while speaking out on George Floyd's death https://t.co/lWU0Pngymi

name: CNN
text: As protesters gathered outside the White House on Friday night in Washington, DC, President Trump was taken to the building's underground bunker for a little under an hour, according to a White House official and a law enforcement source. https://t.co/hugtYRvcT8

name: CNN
text: Amid protests Friday night, President Trump was taken to the White House underground bunker for a little under an hour, according to a White House official and a law enforcement source. CNN's @MarquardtA reports. https://t.co/Tdu2joLPFd https://t.co/FBWXpoATGJ

name: CNN
text: "For once, Don't Do It. Don't pretend there's not a problem in America. Don't turn your back on racism..." Nike posted a video with messaging encouraging people to "For once, Don't Do It," a play on the brand's iconic slogan https://t.co/6PYwbjb1Hr

name: CNN
text:
A sheriff joined a protest in Flint, Michigan, after speaking with demonstrators who were met by police officers in riot gear, according to CNN affiliate WEYI.

"I want to make this a parade, not a protest," Genesee County Sheriff Chris Swanson said. https://t.co/zy6p5QbSLH https://t.co/1Cgce89VP1

name: CNN
text: "This past week has brought tragedy upon tragedy to our nation. ... But our President was mostly busy with other things," writes David Gergen for @CNNOpinion https://t.co/ImnmmlaGJS

name: CNN
text: "I am absolutely, devastatingly sorry for their loss. If I could do anything to bring Mr. Floyd back, I would do that. I would move heaven and Earth to do that." Minneapolis Police Chief Medaria Arradondo addresses the family of George Floyd live on CNN. https://t.co/tzZe64FaEp https://t.co/dOmRV6O7ZV

name: CNN
text: Two Atlanta police officers have been fired after a video showed them tasing a man and using excessive force on a woman https://t.co/UM2M5fzF0h
